title: Sony LinkBuds review: Unique hardware audio transparency that outclasses AirPods Pro
content:
Sony recently launched its new LinkBuds, a pair of unique true wireless earbuds that offer a more novel take on your everyday listening. Sporting figure eight designs, these buds have a distinctive ring-shaped driver that allows allows you to still hear ambient audio. Giving Apple’s best-in-class Transparency mode a run for its money, we go hands-on with Sony’s latest to see if they’re worth .

more…

The post Sony LinkBuds review: Unique hardware audio transparency that outclasses AirPods Pro appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Sony LinkBuds deliver a unique design centered around ring-shaped drivers that allow audio to pass through from your surroundings.
